findings.title: Burn of transfer of tokens missing
findings.description: The burn event of transferring tokens needs to be defined and handled properly to notify users about the actual event on the tokens.

findings.title: Functional logic failed on multiple transaction testing scripts
findings.description: The implementation of functional logic failed during multiple transaction testing scripts on the test network.

findings.title: Code does not perform the business logic as per the description or expected events
findings.description: The migrateFromEth() function in DigipharmToTerraMigrator.sol contract does not perform the business logic as described, and a suggestion is provided to create one function on one chain to initiate the burn function.
